name: testcafe-example
description: Cloud web application functional end-to-end test project
author: Hortonworks Inc. (https://hortonworks.com)

scripts.test-live: node_modules/.bin/testcafe-live chrome tests/test.ts -r spec xunit:results/res.xml -S -s results/screenshots
scripts.test: node_modules/.bin/testcafe chrome tests/test.ts -r spec xunit:results/res.xml -S -s results/screenshots
